channel.title: Hugo on Hunter Tunnicliff
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Hunter Tunnicliff

item.title: Welcome to my new website
item.description: Welcome I’m very glad to introduce my new website! It’s a static website that I have done in less than 3 hours with this Hugo tutorial Here is some test code for the syntax highlighter: body { font-family: “Noto Sans”, sans-serif; } More code (in Python): >>> from pygments.styles import get_all_styles >>> styles = list(get_all_styles()) >>> print styles
